items.value: time to learn about Mailboxes and Contracts!

Welcome to my Business!
Your first Job will be to get Contracts.

You will receive a key from me that gives you access to all Mailboxes.
In these Mailboxes there are orders that you bring me!
Of course I will give you shares of the profit!
tell me more, i am interested!

There is a Mailbox in every City / Town!
Find them all and then return to me.

If you lose the Key, that's it and you can't continue with me.
So take good care of the Business Key.
i understand where did we stop?
i am busy! may i come back later..

There is a Mailbox in every City / Town.
With the Business Key you have access to all of them.

Once you've checked out all the Mailboxes, come back to me!
I will reward you for the Contracts.

You get:
1x Business Key
Roger Ivan, i will do my best!
